title: CptStupendous please read this thread
body:
I played a game with you where I was Jax and you were Morgana. After we won when you gifted us I searched for your league name desperatley to try and thank you only to discover that you were a rioter! Since I couldn't add you and I still want to thank you I'm making this thread. 

PS my duo buddy Crazy_Russian09 sends his thanks too, if you ever see us in a game again remind us to gift you back. Even if you feed :P.

replies.body:
Hey Buddy!

I didn't feed! :-p No need to thank me, I had a great time so I wanted to thank you all. I really appreciate you making this thread though, it's made my night. 

gg!

I'll pass it on to him, I was the Tristana.  That was a super fun game - you guys both played great!

Cheers!
Mindstar
*looks off to the sunset* boys we have just heard something that will never happen to us
